mapper.select: select NAME, AMOUNT from INGREDIENTS where RECIPENUM=#{num}
select STEP, EXPLAIN, FNAME, ONAME from STEPS where RECIPENUM=#{num}
select HASHTAG from HASHTAG where RECIPENUM=#{num}

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select WRITER, FOODNAME, TITLE, REP_PIC, RATING, ELAPSEDTIME, SCRAP from RECIPE
where TITLE like '%'||#{find}||'%'
where WRITER like '%'||#{find}||'%'
order by
REGDATE
RATING
HIT
desc) L) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select C.WRITER, C.FOODNAME, C.TITLE, C.REP_PIC, C.RATING, C.ELAPSEDTIME, C.SCRAP from RECIPE C, INGREDIENTS I where C.NUM=I.NUM and where C.FOODNAME like '%'||#{find}||'%' or where C.NUM=(select RECIPENUM from INGREDIENTS where NAME like '%'||#{find}||'%') order by
REGDATE
RATING
HIT
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select C.WRITER, C.FOODNAME, C.TITLE, C.REP_PIC, C.RATING, C.ELAPSEDTIME, C.SCRAP from RECIPE C, HASHTAG H where C.NUM=H.RECIPENUM and H.RECIPENUM=(select RECIPENUM from HASHTAG where HASHTAG in
#{dto.hashtag} ) order by
REGDATE
RATING
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select C.WRITER, C.FOODNAME, C.TITLE, C.REP_PIC, C.RATING, C.ELAPSEDTIME, C.SCRAP from RECIPE C, INGREDIENTS I where C.NUM=I.RECIPENUM and I.RECIPENUM=(select RECIPENUM from INGREDIENTS where NAME in
#{dto.name} ) order by
REGDATE
RATING
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}
